K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-009:437a-0: @437a dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-009:437a-1: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman gyi bla bee d'urya'i 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-009:437a-3: aom bhee sha dzye bhee sha dzye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-009:437a-4: mah'a bhee sha dznye bhee sha dzye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-009:437a-6: sman gtong ba'i tshe sman la sngags kyis gdab pa rdzogs so //
